N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 78.2 - General authority for personal loan department

State Regulations
A savings bank and savings and loan association may operate a
personal loan department under the same requirements as are provided in section
108
(4)
of the Banking Law for a bank or trust
company and may make any loan or advance that a bank or trust company may make
pursuant to the provisions of section
108
(4)-(5)
of the Banking Law on the same terms
and conditions as provided in such sections. Notes
